title: Global Config Guide
subheading: Step-by-step guide to using the global config instead of the portable config.

contents.Text: Due to windows file system restrictions and complexity I've removed the `use global config` button.
Instead, simply relocate the RhythmiRust_config file to one of the following locations:
By doing so, you'll be using the global config instead of the portable config. This will mean that you can use the same config for all of your RhythmiRust installations.
Thus when updating RhythmiRust you don't have to worry where to put the binary/executable.
